availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David A. Miller, Sr. (Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mariah Miller. Father of David A. Miler, Jr., Joseph T. Miller, Amos Miller. Farmer in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 594.
Find A Grave, "David Anderson Miller (1801-1886)," Memorial #24888630, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/24888630(accessed January 16, 2019).
